ygData.subject: AGG I NEED HELP!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok so this si the story, way back when i posted a message saying i need cha but didnt know what to get, and some nice people replied back that i should think
ygData.messageBody:
Ok so this si the story, way back when i posted a message saying i need cha but didnt know what to get, and some nice people replied back that i should think about gewtting heavy cha cause of charm.They said with charm i sould eaily solo blacks and MAYBE yellows if my cha was high enough. Well i sepnt about 2500pp on new equipment, i revamped all my jewelry and now i have 160cha. Then the big day arrived, i got charm. I mem'd it and ran out to nroth karana to try it out. I charmed a lion, and got it to attack a snake, then i redid thia until the snake started running, i asked the lion to go attack it. It ran off and 20 seconds later i it was dead. Then i went to south kara and charmed an elephant, i got it to attack a minotaur and when the charm ran otiu they ran towards me, and beat the livin #%@$ outta me =( i got rooted or something and i couldnt cast. So my question is HOW DO I USE CHARM? i really dont want all ym cha stuff to go to waist, i sold SO much to afford all of it. Can anyone on povar show me how? or could someone maybe emAIL ME EXPLAINIING HOW TO DO IT A BIT? I REALLY REALLY NEED HELP, IF YOU SHOW ME HOW TO DO IT IN THE GAME ILL GLADLY PAY (BUT I ONLY HAVE 50PP LEFT AFTER BUYING ALL THE CHA STUFF. oops i just realized caps was on. So plz plz plz plz help me? i spent so much on that cha stuff when i oucld have bought better armour. Brett@...

Thanks so much!
Minite McTullin
